programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 11

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 13
programme.desc: The psychic and the cougar hope to conjure up a top-scoring menu. But when the cards fall, will they read fortune or failure?

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 14

programme.title: The New Detectives: Murder For Hire
programme.desc: For some killers, murder can be a profitable business. And the scene of the crime can be both a source for clues, and puzzling questions. When a victim has been targeted for death, investigators must look beyond the obvious to uncover a murder for hire.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Military Justice
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Collective Justice
programme.desc: Philadelphia's Vidocq Society, named after an 18th Century French detective, is one of the world's most unusual crime-solving organizations.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Elements Of Murder
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison. When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Patterns Of Guilt
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The challenge set for the contestants involves making a dessert which could be served at a romantic dinner.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The losers of the blind taste test challange must peel grapes by hand for the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The losers of the blind taste test challange must peel grapes by hand for the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA

programme.title: Full Custom Garage

programme.desc: When Dylan is badly injured in a lab explosion, he travels through a series of alternate realities.

programme.desc: Rommie is rebuilt to help evacuate the Seefra system.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Fallen Angel

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special

programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Girls Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: Sallie-Anne Huckstepp and Juanita Nielsen were iconic figures in the shadowy King’s Cross scene of the 1970s and 1980s. They lived dangerous lives – challenging the status quo of the period and met with mysterious and violent deaths.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: When Jodi discards a chain letter, misfortune strikes Drovers. Has she unleashed a curse?

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: The appearance of mysterious Min Min lights over Drover’s Run coincides with life altering events for Claire and Tess.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: As an emu plague descends upon Drovers Run, Claire is challenged by the demands of her newborn baby.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Peter’s return to Drover’s Run during the naming ceremony of his and Claire’s baby daughter, leads to a very important decision.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Meg is dedicating herself to her studies in order to prove herself at TAFE, and is thoroughly immersed in ‘Pride and Prejudice’. The misunderstandings of character that drive that classic echo through everyone’s dealings at Drovers Run.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue helicopter long-lines an injured snowmobiler off a steep mountainside.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Crawford Bay near Nelson British Columbia, search teams are looking for a missing 1946 two-seater vintage Ercoupe.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue combs the backcountry for a missing snowshoer.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR takes a maiden voyage in their new rescue boat to save a single mother and her young son.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Lions Bay and North Shore Rescue team up to long-line a severely injured French mountain climber off a steep rock face.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue is en route to the scene of a helicopter crash in the Kootenay River.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rookies get a chance to show their stuff while helping an injured hiker.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: King of Kings
programme.desc: Joel claims he is a king looking for his queen. He says that him and Jerrica would succeed if she would just fall in line in his kingdom. Jerrica says she can no longer accept Joel’s list of rules and take his verbal abuse. She is ready to walk away.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drunk in Love
programme.desc: Cheryl Kaplan is fed up with Cody Green’s drinking. She says Cody is unaffectionate and believes he’s cheating. The final straw was when they lost their home and he pressured her to leave behind her daughter in Ohio to live with his family.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Track Me Down
programme.desc: Briana is suspicious of Geovani because she claims he is way too sexual and can’t keep his hands off her. She thinks that if he has that much drive for her, how could he not have it for other women.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Greed is Good
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Where the Wild Things Are
programme.desc: Dog, Beth and the team are in Colorado and they face a special challenge - getting the kids to camp. After the drop-off, Dog is more than ready to track down a fugitive. Robin disposed of a body after a homicide, and now he's skipped his court date.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Best of . . .
programme.desc: The bounty-hunter adventures of Duane "Dog" Chapman and his Posse are chronicled in this one hour "Best Of" special, featuring superlative memorable moments from the previous seven seasons.

programme.title: Girlfriends: The Fast Track and the Furious
programme.desc: Maya goes to work for William.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Some Enchanted Evening
programme.desc: Joan finds her soul mate. Too bad it’s not her boyfriend.

programme.title: Girlfriends: If It’s Broke, Fix It
programme.desc: Toni’s husband is hiding a costly secret.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Snoop, There It Is
programme.desc: Lynn snoops into Sivad’s past.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mr. Almost Episode
programme.desc: Nick runs into an old college friend, who convinces him to bring Deion Sanders aboard his energy drink business – with humiliating consequences.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Play Date Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne and Nick go out with another couple, but the double date soon fizzles when an accusation flies.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lindsey Gets High Episode
programme.desc: Former child star Todd Bridges guides Lindsey on a wild odyssey to teach her the dangers of drug use. Ice Cube, Charlie Murphy and Jerry Springer also guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Liar, Liar Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne insists that everyone in the family tell the truth at all times after she catches Nick in a lie.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Fight Party Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne's book group and Nick's boxing-match party collide in the family room on the same night, resulting in knock-out clashing.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick's Kid Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne suspects that Nick may have fathered his ex-flame's son. Ice Cube and Kandi Burruss guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Kevin Gets a Commercial Episode
programme.desc: Kevin's burgeoning career as a child actor has a negative fallout when a potential big break goes to his head. Ted Lange guest stars.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Southern Discomfort At Sweetwater Mansion
programme.desc: PRS heads to the Deep South to investigate a haunted Antebellum Mansion in disrepair. The caretaker and volunteers at the property have many a tale to tell of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Glove
programme.desc: When a terrifying haunting threatens to break a Daisytown, PA couple apart, PRS is their last resort. As the investigation deepens, PRS and the family learn that it's just the tip of iceberg, turns out this haunting might be all in the family.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Ashwell Prison As Live Pt 1

programme.title: Bate Hall Pt 1

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 1

programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Commander Adama is critically injured when Cylon warriors carry out a kamikaze-like mission against the Battlestar Galactica, causing a raging inferno aboard the ship and threatening the lives of the last survivors of the human race.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: An alien joins the Galactica fleet, attracting its people, including Apollo’s girlfriend, Sheba, with mysterious powers and promises of a successful end to their search for Earth.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger grants the interplanetary immigrants three miraculous wishes in exchange for their blind allegiance.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Starbuck must save a man he believes to be his long-lost father (special guest star Fred Astaire), from bloodthirsty Borellian henchmen who are out to kill him.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Apollo uncovers a blackmail operation and finds his own life in great danger as he races against time to clear Starbuck, who has been accused of murdering a fellow viper pilot.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: When Apollo and Starbuck intercept a primitive ship floating through space, the young warriors discover that its inhabitants, who are in suspended animation, represent a direct link to Earth.

programme.title: Dynasty: Cliffs

programme.title: Dynasty: The Plea

programme.title: Dynasty: The Roof

programme.title: Dynasty: The Wedding

programme.title: Dynasty: The Will

programme.title: World's Greatest: Archipelagos
programme.desc: The romantic notion of island life has always attracted us. Explore the histories, cultures, and unique ways of life on the World’s Greatest Archipelagos - clusters of islands that share common bonds of geography, geology, and genealogy.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Drives
programme.desc: A journey by road expands our horizons, allowing us to explore the depth and breadth of whole countries and continents, stopping whenever and wherever we chose.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Flights
programme.desc: Our experience of the world’s greatest marvels is literally and figuratively elevated when we explore them from the air. Whether you travel by air balloon, helicopter, light aircraft, a grand perspective is always guaranteed.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswana’s Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Soccer Shocker/Brother, Can You Spare A Clarinet?
programme.desc: Muffy's proud that her dad is the new soccer coach--until he exhausts the team with demanding drills. The try-outs for the Young Person's Orchestra are coming to Lakewood Elementary and everyone agrees that Binky is a shoe-in.

programme.title: Arthur: The Wheel Deal/The Buster Report
programme.desc: After an injury, Brain has to spend some time using a wheelchair. Will he be able to compete in a basketball tournament for charity? The kids are assigned to write a report on someone they admire, and George picks….Buster!

programme.title: Arthur: The Butler Did...What?/The Trouble with Trophies
programme.desc: Bailey is missing! Muffy discovers a series of clues and is left wondering, who exactly IS Bailey? Then, everyone loves getting trophies, right? It turns out that Fern could not care less about them.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Book Battle/On the Buster Scale
programme.desc: Lakewood Elementary has just instituted IRP; a program where kids can earn points (and prizes!) for reading. Then, Buster and Brain never agree on movies. Buster rates every film a 10+, while Brain doesn't seem to like anything.

programme.title: Arthur: Muffy's Art Attack/Tales from the Crib
programme.desc: When Muffy sees a kinetic sculptor’s machines, she brags that she can make even better ones. Then, Vicita is upset at having to trade in her cherished crib for a big-girl bed, so D.W. shares her story of that same rite of passage.

programme.title: Arthur: Follow the Bouncing Ball/Buster Baxter and the Letter from the Sea
programme.desc: Alberto Molina's beloved soccer ball--signed by his favorite Ecuadorian soccer star --is lost! While on vacation, Buster discovers a message in a bottle on the shore. Could it be a message from the people of the lost city of Atlantis?

programme.title: Arthur: The Boy Who Cried Comet/Arthur and Los Vecinos
programme.desc: Buster is convinced that he's seen real UFO's, and he uses Muffy's fancy new telescope to get the proof. Then, Mr. Sipple from next door is moving away and Arthur wonders--who will be the new neighbors?

programme.title: Arthur: Fernlets by Fern/Prunella and the Haunted Locker
programme.desc: Muffy talks Fern into writing poems for a new line of greeting cards which becomes the hit of Elwood City, but booming business causes Fern to burn out. Prunella is assigned a new school locker, which is rumored to be haunted!

programme.title: Arthur: Rhyme For Your Life/For Whom The Bell Tolls
programme.desc: While struggling to write a poem for his mom, Binky falls asleep and gets trapped in Verseberg--where it's a crime not to rhyme! And D.W. has lost her voice! For Arthur it's a dream come true--until Mom asks Arthur to take care of D.W.

programme.title: Secret War: The Special Interrogation Group
programme.desc: The SIG consisted of German speaking Jewish volunteers from Palestine. They had a highly dangerous job: which was to pose as Germans behind enemy lines and extract intelligence and do acts of sabotage. Few had a long-life expectancy.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: In this programme we bring the RAF story into the modern era. Another aircraft to have extended the RAF’s capabilities is the C130 Hercules. This aircraft has proved its capabilities in countless environments from resupply, to dropping paratroopers.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The RAF’s maritime role is often overlooked. Between the wars the RAF operated elegant flying boats to patrol the far flung corners of the Empire.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: After the war, RAF transports helped keep Berliners alive during the Soviet blockade of the city in 1948/49. As well as flying round-the-clock operations into the airport, Sunderland flying boats delivered supplies by landing on Lake Havel near the city.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: By the end of the First World War the RAF had bombers that could fly to Berlin and back. For the first time in a thousand years British civilians found themselves under direct attack - by Zeppelin airships and Gotha bombers.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen
programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Dorion & Jeszica
programme.desc: Dorion is about to give up everything for online love Jeszica, including his relationship with girlfriend Raffinee. But first he wants to know, is Jeszica really the girl in the pictures?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brendan loves McKenna, but failed attempts to connect have left him wondering if McKenna is for real. Nev teams with social media sensation Karrueche Tran to help Brendan uncover the truth. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The Hills: Jason's Birthday
programme.desc: After a Teen Vogue event, Lauren hurries to get home to Jason for his birthday. However, things don't end up so well when Jason only wants to hang out with his friends. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
programme.desc: Jason becomes a distraction in Lauren's life, Heidi finally gets her big chance to work in the nightclub, and when a model drops out from a Teen Vogue fashion show, Whitney steps in. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Boys Night Out
programme.desc: Adam lets loose while his girlfriend Allie is out of town, but when she hears he kissed another girl from Whitney and the others, Adam finds himself in hot water. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: He Never Said He Had a Girlfriend
programme.desc: Allie breaks down after a run in with the girl who claims she kissed Adam, but Adam sticks to his story to win Allie back, and Whitney gets upset with Jay for taking Adam's side. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Kelly Cutrone accuses Allie of being too skinny, and Whitney finds herself caught in the middle. Erin runs into an ex-boyfriend and old feelings begin to return. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.desc: This week our Wardens receive a Tip-Mont call about a few illegally taken elk and pursue the the suspects.

programme.desc: When your job is protecting our most precious natural resources in some of the nation's most remote areas, there is rarely a dull moment. Wardens chronicles the lives of Conservation Officers in America.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Jules and Sam receive some personal news, but don't know whether to share it with the team.

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po feels like having some Tubby Custard. The Teletubbies watch some children visiting a conservatory and drawing cacti. Tinky Winky goes for a walk. Five birds appear in Teletubbyland and the Teletubbies dance round the flowers.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies line up to say 'Eh-oh' and then watch Matthew and Mark feed a baby calf. The Teletubbies play a game to see who can eat their Tubby Custard the slowest, but Po can't wait and eats her Tubby Custard very fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are asleep when a voice trumpet appears singing the rhyme 'Frére Jacques'. The Teletubbies laugh and call "Again, again!"

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch a little girl visit her cousin to stay the night. The Teletubbies are very busy with their favourite things.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies say eh-oh, then laugh as they fall over. They get up to watch some children have fun playing on a huge pile of cushions.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song to Dipsy and Po, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po remembers to snow. The Tubbies watch an international Christmas insert. The Teletubbies explore Teletubbyland; they are very excited when they discover that the house, trees and everything is covered in snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are in Home Hill making loud footstep noises, but Tinky Winky has spilt Tubby Custard on his foot. Who should clean it up? A group of children go for a walk in the woods to play with the autumn leaves.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number three. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa go for a walk. They count three trees and three flowers and Po follows behind counting too.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies watch a little girl have her hair braided by her mum. They put different coloured bands in her hair. In Teletubbyland, Tinky Winky can't sleep.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Beasley’s pipes and boiler are making banging noises and Bob is called in to replace them. Whilst Bob and Wendy are collecting the new Boiler from JJ, Molly explains that she is looking after Mrs Broadbent’s baby rabbits.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scrambler is playing with the Sunflower Valley children; Sunny, Saffron, Carlo and Cassia in the playground. It’s the last day before they have to go back to school in Bobsville and they are all sad to be leaving.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and team are building a barn for Farmer Pickles’ sheep, which has to be ready for the lambing season. Farmer Pickles brings the sheep down from the hills and puts them in a pen until the barn is finished.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is demolishing an old house, and sends the floorboards and roof tiles for recycling. As he finishes the job, he gets a call from Mr Bentley who wants him to renovate the museum’s annexe, where Mr Ellis plans to exhibit the work of local artists.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s built a new waterwheel for the old watermill. He’s made it at the yard, but now needs to dismantle it to take it to the mill in sections. Bob needs Benny, Scoop, Lofty and Muck to carry the wheel sections through the marshland to the mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are drilling a special well at their homestead. The well has its own water tank, which needs to be raised from the ground on rocks. Wendy and Scrambler arrive for the first ever time in Sunflower Valley..

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building a goat run for Farmer Pickles new goat – Giddy. It’s Travis’s job to collect Giddy from Meg MacDonald the goat breeder. Spud teases Travis about being slow and Travis resolves to collect the goat very quickly.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and Dizzy have spent the night at Bob’s old yard in Bobsville to help Wendy with some digging and mixing. The machines all wish that Wendy could come and live out in Sunflower Valley.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scoop and the machines are in Sunflower Valley setting up Wendy’s caravan. Scoop contacts Muck to find out where Bob has got to. Muck explains that they haven’t left Bobsville yet because they’ve lost Bob’s Dad!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Bentley is organising a winter fair in the town hall square and enlists Bob to help set up the stalls, lights and the centrepiece of the fair – a giant inflatable Santa Claus.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team are building a bunkhouse for Farmer Pickles guests The Pickers! Micky, Vicky and Little Ricky are helping with the sunflower harvest. The cabin is to be made of logs so Lofty’s job is very important today, lifting and laying the logs.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Its early morning in Sunflower Valley and Benny arrives bursting with enthusiasm. He’s not needed in Bobsville today and he’s come to the Valley to help. Today, the team are building Mr and Mrs Bentley’s special new house.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Wendy and Bob have a very special announcement to make. They are going to fix up an old Houseboat for Wendy to live in. There’s a lot of hard work to be done. They need to make a gang plank, fix solar panels and give it a really good clean.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob, Scoop and Skip are helping Mr Beasley to install a new Rockery when Mr Bentley appears to ask for Bob’s help. The Mayor wants to stage an art exhibition, but there are no available venues. Scoop suggests renovating the inside of the Old Mill.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Fothergill has a nasty case of dry rot, so Bob and crew will have to use some smelly chemicals to fix it. As these will affect Mr Fothergill’s allergies, he goes to his sister’s for the day. But she doesn’t get on with Hamish, his pet parrot.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Whilst Bob and the team build Annie Pickles new seafront house, Muck is worried that Scoop is a better digger than he is and decides to prove himself with a sandcastle competition.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has been asked to install a new air conditioning unit at Mr Sabatini’s restaurant. Wendy and Molly meanwhile have been asked to redecorate the library at the school.

programme.title: When Bob Became a Builder
programme.desc: It’s a beautiful day in Sunflower Valley and Bob and his machine team are building a new picnic area at the beach. Dizzy, Lofty and Scrambler are clearing stuff that’s been washed up on the beach, while Benny has a great time digging with Scoop and Muck.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Shipman
programme.desc: Doctor Harold Shipman was convicted of killing 15 patients in 2000, but he is thought to have killed up to 215. Discover how he was eventually caught by detectives.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Rochdale Groomers
programme.desc: Rochdale Groomers: Documentary examining the sex abuse scandal which occurred in the North of England and appeared to go undetected for quite some time.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Sally Anne Bowman
programme.desc: A look at the murder of 18-year-old Sally Anne Bowman, who was stabbed in Croydon in 2005. With interviews with her family and detectives who solved the case.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Gemma McCluskie
programme.desc: The harrowing story of EastEnders actress Gemma McCluskie, who was murdered by her older brother in the flat they shared in east London in 2012.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Dunblane Massacre
programme.desc: In an emotional tribute, witnesses and victims' relatives look back on the tragic murder of 16 children and a teacher at Dunblane Primary School in Scotland, 15 years ago.

programme.title: Girlfriends: I'll Have a Blue Line Christmas
programme.desc: Lynn (Persia White) is crushed when she receives a call from Big Boi (guest-starring as himself) saying that he is at a creative crossroads with the record company and he won’t be able to use her music.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Wrong Side of the Tracks
programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) fears that Jabari (Kendre Berry) is growing up too fast after she and Darnell (Khalil Kain) witness an interaction between him and a young girl.

programme.title: Girlfriends: I Want My Baby Back
programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) fears that Jabari (Kendre Berry) is growing up too fast after she and Darnell (Khalil Kain) witness an interaction between him and a young girl.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hot for Preacher

programme.title: Girlfriends: Time to Man Up

programme.title: Girlfriends: What Had Happened Was...

programme.title: Girlfriends: Church Lady
programme.desc: After splitting from Eldon over his objection to pre-marital sex, Lynn longs to get back together. She feels they share a special connection, but Eldon doesn’t appreciate Lynn’s attempts to seduce him.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A Dingo Ate My Dream House
programme.desc: Tired of all the inconveniences of living in the suburbs, Darnell (Khalil Kain) suggests to Maya (Golden Brooks) they should move back to the city, but Maya disagrees and does not want to give up her new home.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Operation Does She Yield
programme.desc: Ever since Monica left William, his life’s been a mess. He can’t work, eat or function normally. Because Joan, Maya, and Lynn feel responsible for driving Monica away, they decide they’ve got to do something to bring the couple back together.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A House Divided
